First , we observe that 300d MRU can achieve comparable performance with BiDAF .

BiLSTM.from sentence: When compared with a BiLSTM of equal output dimensions ( 150 d ) , we find that our MRU model performs competitively , with less than 1 % deprovement across all metrics .

performance of.from sentence: The performance of our model is significantly better than 300d LSTM model while also being significantly faster .

MRU - LSTM.from sentence: Finally , the MRU - LSTM significantly outperforms all models , including BiDAF on this dataset .

Performance improvement.from sentence: Performance improvement over the vanilla BiLSTM model ranges from 1 % ? 3 % across all metrics , suggesting that MRU encoders are also effective as a complementary neural building block .
